ModMetaData.name: Alien Biomes
ModMetaData.author: Steve, Evelyn, Odeum
ModMetaData.description:
Step into an alien world filled with new dangers and exquisite curiosities!\n\nStake your claim on the pink shores of a radiant landscape or brave the soul-draining nights of a world lost in darkness. Stay mesmerized night after night as indigenous flora spring to life in stunningly colorful fashion. Learn new methods of survival and indulge in unorthodox herbal recreation.
Discord: steveo.o
